summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4540 for the improvement of Bothell Way from East 85th Street to 10th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by installation of a street lighting system, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53104, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
